prompt:
A boldly alluring Korean woman in her 20s in a quiet underground mall corridor, low-angle
framing from knee to shoulders.
Outfit: textured trench coat + fitted ribbed knit turtleneck + high-waist pencil skirt, matte
textures, natural creases.
Pose: one hand gripping the coat lapel near collarbone, hips angled forward, subtle arch.
Expression: dominant direct gaze, slightly narrowed half-lidded eyes, soft parted lips, no smile.
Lighting: mixed cool overhead + warm storefront spill (no readable text), smooth highlight roll-
off, mild halation.
Camera: 85mm f/1.8 handheld candid, shallow DOF. Film: Portra 400, subtle grain.
